sys_hub_flow.name: Update Card Prices

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Make an api call to Scryfall's API via the api link on the card record
Look up each card record (except "Workshop Warchief" as it is missing price data for my printing)
Update card price and previous price

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: Mandatory wait between api calls as mentioned on the Scryfall api docs

logic_definition.display_value: Wait for a duration of time
